statements: DELETE FROM library_inventory WHERE book_id = 123456 AND availability = TRUE;
DELETE FROM library_inventory WHERE author = 'Jane Doe' AND publication_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM library_inventory WHERE author_name = 'J.K. Rowling' AND quantity <= 5
DELETE FROM Users WHERE name = 'Alice' AND email = 'alice@example.com';
DELETE FROM books WHERE book_id = 1 AND genre = 'Fiction';
DELETE FROM libraries WHERE location = 'New York' AND librarian_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM library_patrons WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM library_books WHERE genre='Mystery' AND published_year < 2000;
DELETE FROM library_loan_history WHERE loan_id IN (SELECT loan_id FROM library_loans WHERE return_date < '2022-01-01');
